name: Animal Movement
description: This is a unreal engine project where you can use 9 animal as your character. You will have the animal model, animation and blueprint. Those animals are Deer, Elephant, Fox, Hippo, Lion, Pig, Rhino, Wolf, Zebra.  Watch the You tube tutorial to know how to use it. This is a zip file I upload. Download the file and unzip it. Then open the file in unreal engine 4.26 version or upper version
